ygData.subject: RE: Re: Tusk quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh my GOD!!!!!  I am on this mailing list..  And this is the first message I have seen...  Could someone have the mail administrator see whats wrong?
ygData.messageBody:
Oh my GOD!!!!! I am on this mailing list.. And this is the first message I
have seen... Could someone have the mail administrator see whats wrong?

> ----------
> From: Xillith ofNeriak[SMTP:xillith@...]
> Reply To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, September 29, 1999 8:31 AM
> To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Re: Tusk quest
>
> From: "Xillith ofNeriak" <xillith@...>
>
> Hey, I have the ring of the dead.
>
> It needed the Thex Mallet after all. Do that and it's yours. THe quest
> is
> apparently satisfied by either method. But in my opinion, Thex Mallet is
> the simplest.
>
> Xillith
> Rallos Zek
>
> The ring is worth the wait !
>
> >
